mapper.select: select count(*) as count,i.item_text as punish_type from smart_punish_people as p ,sys_dict as d,sys_dict_item as i where p.punish_type = i.item_value and d.dict_code = 'punish_type' and i.dict_id = d.id group by p.punish_type,i.item_text
select count(*) from smart_punish_people s where substr(s.remove_time,1,7) = #{currentMonth}
select count(*) from smart_punish_people where punish_id in ( select id from sys_user where depart_ids = #{departId} and user_identity = '2' )
